name: Guardian (itch) (TheGamerUrso)
description:
Take back the flow of Time! An inter dimensional being by the name of Odium is forcing Time to move to his will, which is causing rifts in the space-time continuum. Only the Time Guardians can stop Odium before the universe collapses in on itself!

2D Action Platformer game inspired by the "End of Time" theme for #gamedevjongamejam3 #uug. Built in a little over 2 weeks.

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD to move SPACE to Jump 2xSpace to Double Jump Mouse Left Click to Shoot E Interact with Rifts

Defeat the Enemies Enter the Rifts and run to the top to destroy the rift Kill all the rifts to unlock the way to the boss. #platformer
